name: Quantum Cloak
description: With this, you no longer need your robe and wizard hat. Become the hero in your own magical world when you put on this cloak, which makes your body intangible, taking no damage.
source: Enter a quantum state for **10** seconds, during which enemies cannot detect the wearer. The wearer exits quantum state after attacking once. Cooldown: **120** seconds.

advancement.description: +**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **1** successful attack.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
+**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **3** successful attacks.
